div.head: 湯火燒瘡
div.div: sores following burning by boiling water and fire

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sores following burning by boiling water and fire

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fen xi 粉錫 quoting an unknown work allegedly compiled by Sun Zhenren: 湯火燒瘡：胡粉，羊 髓和，塗之 , “ Sores following burning by boiling water and fire : Mix hu fen with bone marrow of sheep, and apply externally”.
